persona.name: Remy
persona.bio: Remy, a 41-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for his conservative and big-picture approach to investing. With years of experience under his belt, he navigates the volatile crypto market with a healthy dose of pessimism, carefully analyzing long-term trends rather than chasing short-term gains. His strategic foresight and meticulous risk management have earned him a reputation as a cautious yet insightful investor.
